{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

##  Trivia 

* Nature's Bounty is the only potion that cannot be crafted, and the only non-combat potion (although technically it can only be used in combat, since the spell to create it is combat only).
